title: The huge phone booth
where_when: In the middle of the huge field
text: You are at a phone booth in a middle of a huge field.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Making phone call
text: You pick up the heavy receiver. There is no dial tone, only a faint, rhythmic static. You speak, but only the static answers.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Around the booth
text: You step out onto the soft grass. The field stretches to the horizon in every direction, an ocean of green under a pale, featureless sky.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: A glint of light
text: As you walk, the silence is absolute. After a few minutes, you spot something glinting in the distance, catching the non-existent sun.

choices.label: Ignore it and walk another way

exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The humming cube
text: You approach the source of the light. It's a small, metallic cube, hovering an inch above the grass and humming with a low energy.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: A different path
text: You decide to ignore the distraction and choose a random direction. As you walk, the sky begins to darken unnaturally fast.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: A change of scenery
text: As your fingers touch the cube, it grows warm. The field around you dissolves like a mirage, replaced by a forest of crystalline trees glowing with soft inner light.

choices.label: Look for a path around it

exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The glowing forest
text: You find yourself at the edge of a forest made of glowing, crystalline trees. The air hums with the same energy as the cube.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Sudden twilight
text: The sky is now a deep twilight. You stumble over something hard in the dim light - a metallic cube, identical to the one you saw earlier. As you touch it, the world shifts.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Two paths
text: The forest floor is soft moss. The light from the crystal trees casts strange, shifting shadows. The path splits before you.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Into the light
text: You step into the forest. The light is beautiful and mesmerizing. Ahead, the path splits. One fork winds up a hill, the other descends into a misty hollow.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The long way around
text: You try to walk around the forest, but it seems to stretch infinitely. You find a dark cave entrance nestled in the roots of a giant crystal tree.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The hilltop clearing
text: You reach a clearing at the top of the hill. In the center stands a single, large, pulsating crystal.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The Crystal Peak
text: The path up the hill leads to a small clearing. In the middle is a floating crystal that pulses with a gentle light. Below, you can see the entire forest.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Misty Hollow
text: You descend into a hollow filled with cool, shimmering mist. A stream of liquid light flows through it. A small, furry creature is drinking from the stream.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The whispering cave
text: You enter the dark cave. The air is cool and still. You hear faint whispers echoing from deep within.

choices.label: Light the cube for better visibility

exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Into the Dark
text: You step into the cave. It's pitch black. You can hear the dripping of water and faint whispers that seem to come from all directions.

choices.label: Follow the source of the whispers

exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: No Way Around
text: After what feels like an hour, you realize you've walked in a circle, arriving back at the same cave entrance. It seems to be the only way forward.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: A Vision
text: Touching the crystal fills your mind with a vision: a tall, impossibly thin tower piercing the clouds.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Vision of the Tower
text: As you touch the crystal, an image floods your mind: a tall, sleek tower of black stone, standing alone in a desolate landscape.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: A New Path
text: As you watch the crystal, it projects a beam of light, illuminating a new, previously hidden path leading out of the forest.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Stream of Light
text: The liquid light tastes like ozone and warmth. You feel energized. The small creature looks at you and then scurries down a tunnel.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Liquid Energy
text: You cup your hands and drink. A pleasant warmth spreads through you, and you feel invigorated. The mist begins to clear.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: A Hidden Passage
text: You follow the creature into a small tunnel hidden behind a curtain of moss. The tunnel slopes steeply downwards.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Echo Chamber
text: The whispers lead you to a vast cavern. In the center is a pool of dark, still water. The whispers are your own thoughts, reflected back at you.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The Whispering Cavern
text: You find the source of the whispers is a large, open cavern where your own thoughts seem to echo back to you. There's a pool of perfectly still water in the center.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Let There Be Light
text: You focus on the cube, and it emits a bright, steady light, illuminating the cave. The walls are covered in complex geometric carvings.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Lonely Tower
text: The path leads out of the forest and onto a plain of black sand under a violet sky. In the distance stands the tower from your vision.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Underdark
text: The tunnel opens into a massive underground cavern, lit by glowing fungi. In the center, a colossal structure rises from the ground - the base of the tower.

choices.label: Find a way into the tower's base

exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Source
text: You follow the stream of light to its source: a crack in the cave floor from which the light pours. The crack is just wide enough to squeeze through.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Foundation
text: You emerge into a vast, silent chamber filled with dormant machinery. You are inside the base of the black tower.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Pool of Stars
text: The water in the pool is not water, but a liquid sky filled with stars. Gazing into it shows you the tower, and a path to it.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Liquid Cosmos
text: You look into the pool. It's not a reflection you see, but a swirling galaxy of stars. An image forms in the depths: the black tower.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Carved History
text: The carvings depict a complex star map, with lines connecting countless worlds. All lines converge on a central symbol: a tall, thin tower.

choices.label: Look for an exit corresponding to the map

exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Tower Entrance
text: You stand before the tower. There is no visible door or window, just smooth, seamless black stone.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The Gate
text: You arrive at the base of the impossibly tall tower. A single, massive door of the same black stone is set into the wall, with no handle or lock.

choices.label: Press the cube against the door

exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Spiral Staircase
text: You find a spiral staircase winding its way up into the darkness. It seems to be the only way to ascend.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Way In
text: Pressing the cube to the wall causes a doorway to silently iris open. You step inside a large, circular room. In the center is a pedestal.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Key
text: As the cube touches the door, both hum with the same frequency. The stone dissolves, revealing a brightly lit hallway.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: No Entry
text: The wall is cool and smooth to the touch. It feels ancient and impenetrable. There is no way in here.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Pedestal
text: The pedestal has a cube-shaped indentation on its surface. The room is otherwise bare.

choices.label: Place the cube on the pedestal
Touch the pedestal with your hand

exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The Upper Chamber
text: After a long climb, you emerge into a circular chamber at the very top of the tower. The ceiling is a dome of stars. In the center is a pedestal.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Control Room
text: You enter a vast, circular room. In the exact center is a single pedestal of black stone with a cube-shaped slot on top.

choices.label: Place your cube in the slot

exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Activation
text: The cube clicks into place. The room floods with light, and the walls become a 360-degree view of the stars. A holographic map appears over the pedestal.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Star Map
text: As the cube settles into the slot, the room hums to life. A vast, holographic star map appears floating above the pedestal, showing countless worlds.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Inert
text: You touch the pedestal. Nothing happens. It's just a cold, dead stone without its key.

choices.label: Place the cube on the pedestal

exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Crossroads of Worlds
text: The map is a nexus of pathways. One point of light is labeled 'Home.' Countless others are unlabeled and unknown.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Destination: Home
text: Your thoughts guide your hand. You find a familiar spiral galaxy, a yellow star, a small blue planet. The map highlights it with the word 'Home'.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: A Leap of Faith
text: The possibilities are endless. You close your eyes and point to a random spot on the map. A world with twin suns and purple oceans is selected.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: The Portal
text: Once you make your selection, a section of the wall dissolves into a shimmering portal, showing you your destination.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Homeward Bound
text: You select 'Home'. The humming intensifies, and a shimmering portal opens on the far wall. Through it, you see the familiar green grass of the huge field and the phone booth.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: A New Adventure
text: You confirm the unknown world. A shimmering portal opens, revealing a landscape of bizarre, alien beauty under two suns.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Departure
text: You stand on the threshold between worlds. It is time to make a final choice.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The Return
text: You step through and find yourself back in the field. The portal closes behind you. The sky is blue. It's over.
exit_line: This is an ending that loops back to the beginning.

title: A Souvenir
text: You retrieve the cube from the pedestal, which deactivates the portal. You find another way out and return to the field, cube in hand. A key to the universe.
exit_line: This is an ending that loops back to the beginning.

title: A New World
text: You step onto alien soil. The adventure is just beginning.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: First Steps
text: You take a breath of strange, sweet air. The portal closes behind you, leaving you stranded, but free. The adventure has just begun.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: The Twin Suns
text: You find yourself on a beach of purple sand, looking out at a turquoise ocean. Two suns, one gold and one silver, hang in the sky.
exit_line: This is a hook for future scenes beyond S-20B.
